1: A Psalm of David. The LORD is my shepherd, I can want nothing.
2: He feedeth me in a green pasture, and leadeth me to a fresh water.
3: He quickeneth my soul, and bringeth me forth in the way of righteousness for his name's sake.
4: Though I should walk now in the valley of the shadow of death, yet I fear no evil, for thou art with me: thy staff and thy sheephook comfort me.
5: Thou preparest a table before me against mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil, and fillest my cup full.
6: Oh let thy loving-kindness and mercy follow me all the days of my life, that I may dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
